dataIdInfo.idAbs: Lists the metadata of a local or remote multidimensional dataset such as, netCDF or HDF.

tool.name: DescribeMultidimensionalDataset

param.name: in_dataset
param.dialogReference:
The path to a multidimensional dataset on disk or a URL that references a dataset located on an OPeNDAP server.

To specify a netCDF file, click the File button and browse to the specific file. To specify a URL, click the String button and enter the OPeNDAP URL of the dataset. The URL must fully qualify a dataset name. For example, http://example.server.com/Datasets/precip1948.nc. Directory browsing of the OPeNDAP server is not supported. For example, you can not enter the URL, http://example.server.com/Datasets to see a list of the files in this directory.
param.pythonReference: The full path or URL of the multidimensional dataset.

param.name: output_report_file
param.dialogReference: The optional output report file.

tool.summary: Lists the metadata of a local or remote multidimensional dataset such as, netCDF or HDF.
tool.usage:
• The University Corporation for Atmospheric Research (UCAR) maintains a popular web-based catalog of scientific data: http://motherlode.ucar.edu/thredds/catalog.html. Use a web-browser, navigate this catalog to the desired dataset. From the list of access protocols, choose OPeNDAP. From the OPeNDAP Dataset Access Form page, copy and paste the Data URL into the tool dialog.

  • OPeNDAP servers will contain many different file types. Not all file types can be converted to netCDF. The tool will generate an error message if the file type can't be converted to netCDF.

scriptExample.title: DescribeMultidimensionalDataset example 1 (local dataset)
scriptExample.code:
import arcpy
# Import the supplemental toolbox. arcpy.ImportToolbox("c:/data/Multidimension Supplemental Tools.pyt")
arcpy.DescribeMultidimensionaldataset_mds("C:/data/netcdf/rainfall.nc", "C:/data/netcdf/rainfall.txt")

scriptExample.title: DescribeMultidimensionalDataset example 2 (remote dataset)
scriptExample.para: Describes an remote multidimensional dataset. No output text file is created.
scriptExample.code:
import arcpy
# Import the supplemental toolbox. arcpy.ImportToolbox("c:/data/Multidimension Supplemental Tools.pyt")
arcpy.DescribeMultidimensionaldataset_mds("http://www.opendap.org/node/157")
